verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5563>departed<s%> from <S%G116>Athens,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2882>Corinth;<s%>

And <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G207>Aquila,<s%> <S%G1085>born<s%> in <S%G4195>Pontus,<s%> <S%G4373>lately<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> from <S%G2482>Italy,<s%> with his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla;<s%> <S%G1223>(because<s%> that <S%G2804>Claudius<s%> had <S%G1299>commanded<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> to <S%G5562>depart<s%> from <S%G4516>Rome:<s%>) and <S%G4334>came<s%> to them.

And <S%G1223>because<s%> he was of the <S%G3673>same<s%> <S%G3673>craft,<s%> he <S%G3306>stayed<s%> with them, and <S%G2038>worked:<s%> for by their <S%G5078>occupation<s%> they were <S%G4635>tentmakers.<s%>
And he <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath,<s%> and <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and the <S%G1672>Greeks.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> and <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> were <S%G2718>come<s%> from <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G4912>pressed<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G1263>testified<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And when they <S%G498>opposed<s%> themselves, and <S%G987>blasphemed,<s%> he <S%G1621>shook<s%> his <S%G2440>raiment,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> be on <S%G5216>your<s%> own <S%G2776>heads;<s%> I am <S%G2513>clean;<s%> from now <S%G3568>on<s%> I will <S%G4198>go<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

And he <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> and <S%G2064>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> man's <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2459>Justus,<s%> one that <S%G4576>worshipped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G4927>joined<s%> <S%G4927>hard<s%> to the <S%G4864>synagogue.<s%>

And <S%G2921>Crispus,<s%> the <S%G752>chief<s%> <S%G752>ruler<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue,<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> on the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> with <S%G3650>all<s%> his <S%G3624>house;<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2881>Corinthians<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> and were <S%G907>baptized.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>spoke<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> in the <S%G3571>night<s%> by a <S%G3705>vision,<s%> Be not <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> but <S%G2980>speak,<s%> and <S%G4623>hold<s%> not your peace: <S%G4623><s%>

For I <S%G1510>am<s%> with you, and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> shall <S%G2007>set<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> you to <S%G2559>hurt<s%> you: for I <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> in <S%G5026>this<s%> city. <S%G4172><s%>
And he <S%G2523>continued<s%> there a <S%G1763>year<s%> and <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them.

And when <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> was the <S%G446>deputy<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2721>made<s%> <S%G2721>insurrection<s%> with <S%G3361>one<s%> <S%G3661>accord<s%> against <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him to the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat,<s%>
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> fellow <S%G374>persuades<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G4576>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

And when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G1161>now<s%> <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> his <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> it were a matter of <S%G92>wrong<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G4467>lewdness,<s%> O you <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G3056>reason<s%> would that I should <S%G430>bear<s%> with you:

But <S%G1487>if<s%> it be a <S%G2213>question<s%> of <S%G3056>words<s%> and <S%G3686>names,<s%> and of <S%G2596>your<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G3700>look<s%> you to it; for I <S%G1014>will<s%> be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2923>judge<s%> of <S%G5130>such<s%> matters.
And he <S%G556>drove<s%> them from the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G4988>Sosthenes,<s%> the <S%G752>chief<s%> <S%G752>ruler<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G5180>beat<s%> him <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat.<s%> And <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> <S%G3199>cared<s%> for <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G5130>those<s%> things.

And <S%G3972>Paul<s%> after this <S%G4357>tarried<s%> there <S%G2089>yet<s%> a <S%G2425>good<s%> <S%G2250>while,<s%> and then <S%G657>took<s%> his <S%G657>leave<s%> of the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and <S%G1602>sailed<s%> there <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4947>Syria,<s%> and with him <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> and <S%G207>Aquila;<s%> having <S%G2751>shorn<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> in <S%G2747>Cenchrea:<s%> for he <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G2171>vow.<s%>

And he <S%G2658>came<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> and <S%G2641>left<s%> them <S%G847>there:<s%> but he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>
When they <S%G2065>desired<s%> him to <S%G3306>tarry<s%> <S%G4119>longer<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> with them, he <S%G1962>consented<s%> not;

But <S%G657>bade<s%> them <S%G657>farewell,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> by <S%G3843>all<s%> <S%G3843>means<s%> <S%G4160>keep<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1859>feast<s%> that <S%G2064>comes<s%> in <S%G2414>Jerusalem:<s%> but I will <S%G344>return<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to you, if <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2309>will.<s%> And he <S%G321>sailed<s%> from <S%G2181>Ephesus.<s%>

And when he had <S%G2718>landed<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> and <S%G305>gone<s%> up, and <S%G782>saluted<s%> the <S%G1577>church,<s%> he <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch.<s%>

And after he had <S%G4160>spent<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> there, he <S%G1831>departed,<s%> and <S%G1330>went<s%> <S%G1330>over<s%> all the <S%G5561>country<s%> of <S%G1054>Galatia<s%> and <S%G5435>Phrygia<s%> in <S%G2517>order,<s%> <S%G1991>strengthening<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G625>Apollos,<s%> <S%G1085>born<s%> at <S%G221>Alexandria,<s%> an <S%G3052>eloquent<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> and <S%G1415>mighty<s%> in the <S%G1124>scriptures,<s%> <S%G2658>came<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> man was <S%G2727>instructed<s%> in the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and being <S%G2204>fervent<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> and <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G199>diligently<s%> the things of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1987>knowing<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John.<s%>

And he <S%G756>began<s%> to speak <S%G3955>boldly<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogue:<s%> <S%G846>whom<s%> when <S%G207>Aquila<s%> and <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> had <S%G191>heard,<s%> they <S%G4355>took<s%> him to them, and <S%G1620>expounded<s%> to him the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G197>more<s%> <S%G197>perfectly.<s%>

And when he was <S%G1014>disposed<s%> to <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G1125>wrote,<s%> <S%G4389>exhorting<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G588>receive<s%> him: <S%G3739>who,<s%> when he was <S%G3854>come,<s%> <S%G4820>helped<s%> them <S%G4183>much<s%> which had <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5485>grace:<s%>

For he <S%G2159>mightily<s%> <S%G1246>convinced<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and that <S%G1219>publicly,<s%> <S%G1925>showing<s%> by the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
